get.summary: Returns the person for an ID
get.description: Returns a single person matching the specified ID or number

parameters.name: usenumberasid
parameters.description: The ID specified in the path corresponds to the person number

parameters.name: validitydate
parameters.description: Validity date; returns the status of the person at this time. If empty, the person is loaded with their current data. Format( yyyy-MM-dd )

parameters.name: personid
parameters.description: ID or number of the person to be returned

parameters.name: personid
parameters.description: ID or number of the person to be changed

parameters.name: usenumberasid
parameters.description: The ID specified in the path corresponds to the person number

parameters.name: changestartdate
parameters.description: The change is valid from this date; if none is specified, the change is valid from the current date. Format( yyyy-MM-dd )

parameters.name: changeenddate
parameters.description: The change is valid up to and including this date; if none is specified, the change is valid forever. Format( yyyy-MM-dd )

requestBody.description: Person resource containing the values to be changed; sub-resources, such as addresses, are adjusted via their endpoints.

get.description: Returns a list of persons matching the input parameters

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for a range from the result list

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Page size; determines the number of result entries

parameters.name: personid
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the customer number field

parameters.name: divisionid
parameters.description: If set, the result is filtered for this accounting client.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the name field

parameters.name: firstname
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the first name field

parameters.name: street
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the street field

parameters.name: houseno
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the house number field

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the city field

parameters.name: postcode
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the postal code field

parameters.name: district
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the district field

parameters.name: countrycode
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the country code field. (according to ISO 3166 ALPHA-2)

parameters.name: addressextension
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the address extension field

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the title field

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the phone number field

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the email field

parameters.name: matchcode
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the customer abbreviation field

parameters.name: salutation
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the salutation field

parameters.name: initials
parameters.description: If set, the text entered is searched in the initials field

parameters.name: referenceOrigin
parameters.description: If set, only results with this origin are searched

parameters.name: referenceIdentifier
parameters.description: If set, only results with this reference are searched. Note: The referenceOrigin parameter must also be specified.

parameters.name: exactmatch
parameters.description: If set and no full-text search is performed, then the individual fields must exactly match the values entered

EmailType.description:
Email type: 
* `STANDARD` - Standard email address
* `EXPORT` - Email address for exports
* `INVOICE` - Invoice email address
* `DUNNING` - Dunning email address

path.description: URL of the endpoint where the error occurred.

systemId.description: Context in which the server is running

itemNo.description: Item number (only needs to be filled for PATCH)

PpaSubscriptionOrderBilling.description: Billing data for a subscription order

PpaSubscriptionOrderSales.description: Sales marketing information for a subscriber order

PpaSubscriptionOrderShipping.description: Delivery information for a subscriber order

startDate.description: Start date of the interruption period

endDate.description: End date of the interruption period

startDate.description: Start calculation period - if specified then the EndDate must also be provided!

endDate.description: End calculation period- if specified then the StartDate must also be provided!

startDate.description: Start date of the complaint period

endDate.description: End date of the complaint period

startDate.description: Start date of the subsequent delivery period

endDate.description: End date of the subsequent delivery period

PpaAdditionalData.description: Additional, customer-specific data for subscription orders
